availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Barbourville, Kentucky, attorney. Knox County, Kentucky, native. Son of Ambrose Y. Anderson and Nancy Anderson. Married Carrie Anderson. Attorney in Barbourville in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Barbourville, p. 396 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Barbourville, p. 25; Find A Grave, "James W Anderson (1825 - 1884)," Memorial #68684861, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=68684861 (accessed November 1, 2017).
